name: Loyola Marymount University
former_names: , St. Vincent's College (1865–1911, 1915–1917) , L.A. College (1911–1915) , Loyola College of Los Angeles (1917–1930) , Loyola University of Los Angeles (1930–1973) '''Also:''' , Marymount Junior College (1932–1948) , Marymount College (1948–1973)
